response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, it's worth more than $80 to me. Considering its worth to you is $100, I propose we come to an agreement that respects both our valuations. Would you be interested in discussing a price that falls between these two figures, perhaps around $95? This way, we can ensure a fair transaction that maximizes satisfaction for both parties.", "product_price": 95}
